alert.note: Alert for Dillon (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 8:53PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BLADEN...ROBESON AND CENTRAL DILLON COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EST... At 853 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rowland, or 10 miles northeast of Dillon, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Dillon, Pembroke, Fairmont, St. Pauls, Rowland, Rex, Hamer, Ammon, South Of The Border, Hestertown, Buie, Robeson Community College, White Oak, Elrod, Smiths, Howellsville, Tolarsville, Duart, and Tobermory. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 189 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
